channel.title: Roadwalking help

item.title: Roadwalking help
item.dc:creator: @omgh4x0rz omgh4x0rz
item.description:
@omgh4x0rz wrote:

yea, use RadialRoadWalk in SRL. The reason SCAR won’t find your DTM’s is probably because you didn’t set the color tolerances high enough. Make sure to always test the pixels to make sure you find matches on the screen.

Read full topic

item.title: Roadwalking help
item.dc:creator: @masterofjoe masterofjoe
item.description:
@masterofjoe wrote:

I need help with a roadmaking procedure. I’m writing a firemaker script that starts in Falador East Bank, and walks up to the range near the garden and lights fires,(see Fig 1) then withdraws logs and repeats until all the logs are gone. I don’t know have any idea of how to start writing a roadwalking procedure. This is my script so far. It’s not very good, but I’m learning:D.

program Firemaker;
{.include srl/srl.scar}
{.include srl/Firemaking.scar}

Procedure DeclarePlayers;
begin
HowManyPlayers  :=1;
NumberOfPlayers( HowManyPlayers );
CurrentPlayer:=0;
Players[0].Name := 'character';
Players[0].Pass := 'character';
Players[0].Nick := 'ter';
Players[0].Active:=True;
end;

begin
Setupsrl;
DeclarePlayers;
ActivateClient;
Loginplayer;
wait(100);
Writeln('Logged in.');
OpenBank3;
wait(300)
Withdraw(1,1,27);
wait(250)
CloseBank;
Writeln('Withdrew logs.');
end.

Fig1:

Read full topic
